title: Moroccan fish stew
description: An impressive dish that's fantastically easy to make. Perfect for a relaxed dinner with friends.Each serving provides 249kcal, 28g protein, 19g carbohydrate (of which 9.5g sugars), 5.5g fat (of which	0.8g saturates), 5g fibre and	0.5g salt.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz firm white fish fillets (cod, snapper or ling) cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
